name: Terminal Hacker (itch) (Blackthunder56)
description: This project is a word anagram unscrambling game. During the development, I dove deeper into the C# language learning numerous skills. I learned how to use the Rename tool to change a method name wherever that method appeared. I also learned about switch statements which are basically If statements that are used mainly for comparing 2 values. I got more practice on If statements and print statements I learned from Java coding as well. Overall this project taught me more about Unity development and I hope to further my skills.
